channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-28520|2023-05-12T01:11:55.961Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics%20local
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics Local 2.0 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 250454.

item.title: CVE-2023-28517|2024-03-13T09:14:01.863Z -- ibm -- sterling%20partner%20engagement%20manager
item.description: IBM Sterling Partner Engagement Manager 6.1.2, 6.2.0, and 6.2.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 250421.

item.title: CVE-2023-28956|2023-06-22T01:00:26.647Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect%20backup-archive%20client
item.description: IBM Spectrum Protect Backup-Archive Client 8.1.0.0 through 8.1.17.2 may allow a local user to escalate their privileges due to improper access controls. IBM X-Force ID: 251767.

item.title: CVE-2023-28530|2023-07-22T01:47:06.552Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1 and 11.2 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of SVG Files in Custom Visualizations. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute scripts in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials. IBM X-Force ID: 251214.

item.title: CVE-2023-28526|2023-12-09T02:22:19.624Z -- ibm -- informix%20dynamic%20server
item.description: IBM Informix Dynamic Server 12.10 and 14.10 archecker is vulnerable to a heap buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking which could allow a local user to cause a segmentation fault. IBM X-Force ID: 251204.

item.title: CVE-2023-28527|2023-12-09T02:15:39.553Z -- ibm -- informix%20dynamic%20server
item.description: IBM Informix Dynamic Server 12.10 and 14.10 cdr is vulnerable to a heap buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking which could allow a local user to cause a segmentation fault. IBM X-Force ID: 251206.

item.title: CVE-2023-28950|2023-05-19T15:20:50.476Z -- ibm -- mq
item.description: IBM MQ 8.0, 9.0, 9.1, 9.2, and 9.3 could disclose sensitive user information from a trace file if that functionality has been enabled. IBM X-Force ID: 251358.

item.title: CVE-2023-28528|2023-04-28T02:06:06.829Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, 7.3, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the invscout command to execute arbitrary commands. IBM X-Force ID: 251207.

item.title: CVE-2023-28512|2024-06-04T17:28:52.025Z -- ibm -- watson%20cp4d%20data%20stores
item.description: IBM Watson CP4D Data Stores 4.6.0, 4.6.1, and 4.6.2 could allow an attacker with specific knowledge about the system to manipulate data due to improper input validation. IBM X-Force ID: 250396.

item.title: CVE-2023-28953|2023-07-10T00:17:30.448Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics%20cartridge%20for%20cloud%20pak%20for%20data
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics on Cloud Pak for Data 4.0 could allow an attacker to make system calls that might compromise the security of the containers due to misconfigured security context. IBM X-Force ID: 251465.

item.title: CVE-2023-28949|2024-03-01T01:53:43.368Z -- ibm -- engineering%20requirements%20management
item.description: IBM Engineering Requirements Management DOORS 9.7.2.7 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 251216.

item.title: CVE-2023-28525|2024-06-04T17:28:50.717Z -- ibm -- engineering%20requirements%20management
item.description: IBM Engineering Requirements Management 9.7.2.7 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 251052.

item.title: CVE-2023-28952|2024-06-04T17:28:50.290Z -- ibm -- cognos%20controller
item.description: IBM Cognos Controller 10.4.1, 10.4.2, and 11.0.0 is vulnerable to injection attacks in application logging by not sanitizing user provided data. IBM X-Force ID: 251463.

item.title: CVE-2023-28513|2023-07-19T01:49:14.604Z -- ibm -- mq
item.description: IBM MQ 9.0 LTS, 9.1 LTS, 9.2 LTS, 9.3 LTS, 9.2 CD, and 9.3 CD and IBM MQ Appliance 9.2 LTS, 9.3 LTS, 9.2 CD, and 9.2 LTS, under certain configurations, is vulnerable to a denial of service attack caused by an error processing messages. IBM X-Force ID: 250397.

item.title: CVE-2023-28529|2023-05-19T15:44:16.928Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 251213.

item.title: CVE-2023-28522|2023-05-12T01:22:58.543Z -- ibm -- api%20connect
item.description: IBM API Connect V10 could allow an authenticated user to perform actions that they should not have access to. IBM X-Force ID: 250585.

item.title: CVE-2023-28514|2023-05-19T14:43:45.786Z -- ibm -- mq
item.description: IBM MQ 8.0, 9.0, and 9.1 could allow a local user to obtain sensitive credential information when a detailed technical error message is returned in a stack trace. IBM X-Force ID: 250398.

item.title: CVE-2023-28955|2023-07-10T01:09:59.829Z -- ibm -- watson%20knowledge%20catalog%20on%20cloud%20pak%20for%20data
item.description: IBM Watson Knowledge Catalog on Cloud Pak for Data 4.0 could allow an authenticated user send a specially crafted request that could cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 251704.

item.title: CVE-2023-28958|2023-07-10T01:06:17.925Z -- ibm -- watson%20knowledge%20catalog%20on%20cloud%20pak%20for%20data
item.description: IBM Watson Knowledge Catalog on Cloud Pak for Data 4.0 is potentially vulnerable to CSV Injection. A remote attacker could execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by improper validation of csv file contents. IBM X-Force ID: 251782.

item.title: CVE-2023-28523|2023-12-09T02:24:19.177Z -- ibm -- informix%20dynamic%20server
item.description: IBM Informix Dynamic Server 12.10 and 14.10 onsmsync is vulnerable to a heap buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking which could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code. IBM X-Force ID: 250753.

item.title: CVE-2023-38019|2024-02-02T03:34:56.977Z -- ibm -- soar%20qradar%20plugin%20app
item.description: IBM SOAR QRadar Plugin App 1.0 through 5.0.3 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to view arbitrary files on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 260575.

item.title: CVE-2023-38275|2023-10-22T00:49:42.227Z -- ibm -- cognos%20dashboards%20on%20cloud%20pak%20for%20data
item.description: IBM Cognos Dashboards on Cloud Pak for Data 4.7.0 exposes sensitive information in container images which could lead to further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 260730.

item.title: CVE-2023-38367|2024-02-29T02:13:16.103Z -- ibm -- cloud%20pak%20for%20automation
item.description: IBM Cloud Pak Foundational Services Identity Provider (idP) API (IBM Cloud Pak for Automation 18.0.0, 18.0.1, 18.0.2, 19.0.1, 19.0.2, 19.0.3, 20.0.1, 20.0.2, 20.0.3, 21.0.1, 21.0.2, 21.0.3, 22.0.1, and 22.0.2) allows CRUD Operations with an invalid token. This could allow an unauthenticated attacker to view, update, delete or create an IdP configuration. IBM X-Force ID: 261130.

item.title: CVE-2023-38737|2023-08-16T18:07:30.569Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server%20liberty
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty 22.0.0.13 through 23.0.0.7 is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by sending a specially-crafted request. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the server to consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 262567.

item.title: CVE-2023-38721|2023-08-14T17:25:24.696Z -- ibm -- i
item.description: The IBM i 7.2, 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 product Facsimile Support for i contains a local privilege escalation vulnerability. A malicious actor could gain access to a command line with elevated privileges allowing root access to the host operating system. IBM X-Force ID: 262173.

item.title: CVE-2023-38263|2024-02-02T03:33:13.151Z -- ibm -- soar%20qradar%20plugin%20app
item.description: IBM SOAR QRadar Plugin App 1.0 through 5.0.3 could allow an authenticated user to perform unauthorized actions due to improper access controls. IBM X-Force ID: 260577.

item.title: CVE-2023-38280|2023-10-16T01:03:27.915Z -- ibm -- power%20hmc
item.description: IBM HMC (Hardware Management Console) 10.1.1010.0 and 10.2.1030.0 could allow a local user to escalate their privileges to root access on a restricted shell. IBM X-Force ID: 260740.

item.title: CVE-2023-38003|2023-12-04T00:13:27.709Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 could allow a user with DATAACCESS privileges to execute routines that they should not have access to. IBM X-Force ID: 260214.

item.title: CVE-2023-38740|2023-10-16T21:24:15.155Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX, and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.5 is vulnerable to a denial of service with a specially crafted SQL statement. IBM X-Force ID: 262613.

item.title: CVE-2023-38741|2023-08-14T17:19:00.370Z -- ibm -- txseries%20for%20multiplatforms
item.description: IBM TXSeries for Multiplatforms 8.1, 8.2, and 9.1 is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improper enforcement of the timeout on individual read operations. By conducting a slowloris-type attacks, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 262905.

item.title: CVE-2023-38002|2024-06-04T17:28:25.235Z -- ibm -- storage%20scale
item.description: IBM Storage Scale 5.1.0.0 through 5.1.9.2 could allow an authenticated user to steal or manipulate an active session to gain access to the system. IBM X-Force ID: 260208.

item.title: CVE-2023-38720|2023-10-16T20:52:54.759Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.5 and 11.5 is vulnerable to denial of service with a specially crafted ALTER TABLE statement. IBM X-Force ID: 261616.

item.title: CVE-2023-38366|2024-03-01T02:26:54.534Z -- ibm -- filenet%20content%20manager
item.description: IBM Filenet Content Manager Component 5.5.8.0, 5.5.10.0, and 5.5.11.0 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to view arbitrary files on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 261115.

item.title: CVE-2023-38736|2023-09-08T18:49:24.176Z -- ibm -- qradar%20wincollect%20agent
item.description: IBM QRadar WinCollect Agent 10.0 through 10.1.6, when installed to run as ADMIN or SYSTEM, is vulnerable to a local escalation of privilege attack that a normal user could utilize to gain SYSTEM permissions. IBM X-Force ID: 262542.

item.title: CVE-2023-38273|2024-02-02T14:26:10.089Z -- ibm -- cloud%20pak%20system
item.description: IBM Cloud Pak System 2.3.1.1, 2.3.2.0, and 2.3.3.7 uses an inadequate account lockout setting that could allow a remote attacker to brute force account credentials. IBM X-Force ID: 260733.

item.title: CVE-2023-38361|2023-11-18T17:24:26.075Z -- ibm -- cics%20tx%20advanced
item.description: IBM CICS TX Advanced 10.1 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 260770.

item.title: CVE-2023-38727|2023-12-04T01:08:48.495Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to denial of service with a specially crafted SQL statement. IBM X-Force ID: 262257.

item.title: CVE-2023-38264|2024-06-04T17:28:18.641Z -- ibm -- sdk%2C%20java%20technology%20edition
item.description: The IBM SDK, Java Technology Edition's Object Request Broker (ORB) 7.1.0.0 through 7.1.5.21 and 8.0.0.0 through 8.0.8.21 is vulnerable to a denial of service attack in some circumstances due to improper enforcement of the JEP 290 MaxRef and MaxDepth deserialization filters. IBM X-Force ID: 260578.

item.title: CVE-2023-38360|2024-06-04T17:28:17.730Z -- ibm -- cics%20tx%20advanced
item.description: IBM CICS TX Advanced 10.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 260769.

item.title: CVE-2023-38730|2023-08-27T22:10:11.132Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20copy%20data%20management
item.description: IBM Storage Copy Data Management 2.2.0.0 through 2.2.19.0 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 262268.

item.title: CVE-2023-38268|2023-12-01T19:21:13.515Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 260585.

item.title: CVE-2023-38729|2024-04-03T12:27:36.197Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server)10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to sensitive information disclosure when using ADMIN_CMD with IMPORT or EXPORT. IBM X-Force ID: 262259.

item.title: CVE-2023-38359|2024-06-11T17:52:13.907Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.4, and 12.0.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 260744.

item.title: CVE-2023-38267|2024-05-24T14:40:36.381Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Appliance (IBM Security Verify Access Appliance 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.6.1 and IBM Security Verify Access Docker 10.0.6.1) could allow a local user to possibly elevate their privileges due to sensitive configuration information being exposed. IBM X-Force ID: 260584.

item.title: CVE-2023-38363|2023-11-13T16:56:14.461Z -- ibm -- cics%20tx%20advanced
item.description: IBM CICS TX Advanced 10.1 does not set the secure attribute on authorization tokens or session cookies. Attackers may be able to get the cookie values by sending a http:// link to a user or by planting this link in a site the user goes to. The cookie will be sent to the insecure link and the attacker can then obtain the cookie value by snooping the traffic. IBM X-Force ID: 260818.

item.title: CVE-2023-38733|2023-08-22T21:54:14.033Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation 21.0.0 through 21.0.7.1 and 23.0.0 through 23.0.1 server could allow an authenticated user to view sensitive information from installation logs. IBM X-Force Id: 262293.

item.title: CVE-2023-38362|2024-03-04T15:56:12.254Z -- ibm -- cics%20tx%20advanced
item.description: IBM CICS TX Advanced 10.1 could disclose sensitive information to a remote attacker due to observable discrepancy in HTTP responses. IBM X-Force ID: 260814.

item.title: CVE-2023-38732|2023-08-22T13:13:42.214Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation 21.0.0 through 21.0.7 server could allow an authenticated user to view sensitive information from application logs. IBM X-Force ID: 262289.

item.title: CVE-2023-38724|2024-06-04T17:28:08.894Z -- ibm -- cognos%20controller
item.description: IBM Cognos Controller 10.4.1, 10.4.2, and 11.0.0 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 262183.

item.title: CVE-2023-38728|2023-10-16T21:27:06.469Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to denial of service with a specially crafted XML query statement. IBM X-Force ID: 262258.

item.title: CVE-2023-38719|2023-10-16T23:05:41.644Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 11.5 could allow a local user with special privileges to cause a denial of service during database deactivation on DPF. IBM X-Force ID: 261607.

item.title: CVE-2023-38723|2024-03-13T09:16:40.785Z -- ibm -- maximo%20asset%20management
item.description: IBM Maximo Application Suite 7.6.1.3 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 262192.

item.title: CVE-2023-38735|2023-10-22T01:05:02.599Z -- ibm -- cognos%20dashboards%20on%20cloud%20pak%20for%20data
item.description: IBM Cognos Dashboards on Cloud Pak for Data 4.7.0 could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by a reverse tabnabbing flaw. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability and redirect a victim to a phishing site. IBM X-Force ID: 262482.

item.title: CVE-2023-38369|2024-02-07T16:15:04.324Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Container 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.6.1 does not require that docker images should have strong passwords by default, which makes it easier for attackers to compromise user accounts. IBM X-Force ID: 261196.

item.title: CVE-2023-38738|2024-01-19T01:02:53.626Z -- ibm -- openpages%20with%20watson
item.description: IBM OpenPages with Watson 8.3 and 9.0 could provide weaker than expected security in a OpenPages environment using Native authentication. If OpenPages is using Native authentication an attacker with access to the OpenPages database could through a series of specially crafted steps could exploit this weakness and gain unauthorized access to other OpenPages accounts. IBM X-Force ID: 262594.

item.title: CVE-2023-38276|2023-10-22T01:02:41.722Z -- ibm -- cognos%20dashboards%20on%20cloud%20pak%20for%20data
item.description: IBM Cognos Dashboards on Cloud Pak for Data 4.7.0 exposes sensitive information in environment variables which could aid in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 260736.

item.title: CVE-2023-38364|2023-11-13T01:47:44.043Z -- ibm -- cics%20tx%20advanced
item.description: IBM CICS TX Advanced 10.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 260821.

item.title: CVE-2023-38734|2023-08-22T21:18:08.392Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation 21.0.0 through 21.0.7.1 and 23.0.0 through 23.0.1 is vulnerable to incorrect privilege assignment when importing users from an LDAP directory. IBM X-Force ID: 262481.

item.title: CVE-2023-38722|2023-10-23T17:40:32.328Z -- ibm -- sterling%20partner%20engagement%20manager
item.description: IBM Sterling Partner Engagement Manager 6.1.2, 6.2.0, and 6.2.2 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 262174.

item.title: CVE-2023-38372|2024-02-29T00:23:56.355Z -- ibm -- watson%20iot%20platform
item.description: An unauthorized attacker who has obtained an IBM Watson IoT Platform 1.0 security authentication token can use it to impersonate an authorized platform user. IBM X-Force ID: 261201.

item.title: CVE-2023-38020|2024-02-02T03:36:26.147Z -- ibm -- soar%20qradar%20plugin%20app
item.description: IBM SOAR QRadar Plugin App 1.0 through 5.0.3 could allow an authenticated user to manipulate output written to log files. IBM X-Force ID: 260576.

item.title: CVE-2023-38718|2023-09-20T19:12:24.102Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation 21.0.0 through 21.0.7.8 could disclose sensitive information from access to RPA scripts, workflows and related data. IBM X-Force ID: 261606.

item.title: CVE-2023-49880|2023-12-25T02:24:32.216Z -- ibm -- financial%20transaction%20manager%20for%20swift%20services
item.description: In the Message Entry and Repair (MER) facility of IBM Financial Transaction Manager for SWIFT Services 3.2.4 the sending address and the message type of FIN messages are assumed to be immutable. However, an attacker might modify these elements of a business transaction. IBM X-Force ID: 273183.

item.title: CVE-2023-49878|2023-12-13T20:40:52.300Z -- ibm -- system%20storage%20virtualization%20engine
item.description: IBM System Storage Virtualization Engine TS7700 3957-VEC, 3948-VED and 3957-VEC could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 272652.

item.title: CVE-2023-49877|2023-12-13T20:36:31.219Z -- ibm -- system%20storage%20virtualization%20engine
item.description: IBM System Storage Virtualization Engine TS7700 3957-VEC, 3948-VED and 3957-VEC could allow a remote authenticated user to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper filtering of URLs. By submitting a specially crafted HTTP GET request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to view application source code, system configuration information, or other sensitive data related to the Management Interface. IBM X-Force ID: 272651.

item.title: CVE-2023-0041|2023-06-05T02:15:31.346Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.5 could allow a user to take over another user's session due to insufficient session expiration. IBM X-Force ID: 243657.

item.title: CVE-2023-29258|2023-12-04T01:13:28.355Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to a denial of service through a specially crafted federated query on specific federation objects. IBM X-Force ID: 252048.

item.title: CVE-2023-29255|2023-04-27T12:47:02.803Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to a denial of service as it may trap when compiling a variation of an anonymous block. IBM X-Force ID: 251991.

item.title: CVE-2023-29259|2023-07-19T01:14:57.925Z -- ibm -- sterling%20connect%3Aexpress%20for%20unix
item.description: IBM Sterling Connect:Express for UNIX 1.5 browser UI is vulnerable to attacks that rely on the use of cookies without the SameSite attribute. IBM X-Force ID: 252055.

item.title: CVE-2023-29260|2023-07-19T01:17:31.614Z -- ibm -- sterling%20connect%3Aexpress%20for%20unix
item.description: IBM Sterling Connect:Express for UNIX 1.5 is vulnerable to server-side request forgery (SSRF). This may allow an authenticated attacker to send unauthorized requests from the system, potentially leading to network enumeration or facilitating other attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 252135.

item.title: CVE-2023-29256|2023-07-09T23:27:56.560Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to an information disclosure due to improper privilege management when certain federation features are used. IBM X-Force ID: 252046.

item.title: CVE-2023-29257|2023-04-26T12:56:10.502Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to remote code execution as a database administrator of one database may execute code or read/write files from another database within the same instance. IBM X-Force ID: 252011.

item.title: CVE-2023-29261|2023-09-05T00:00:10.852Z -- ibm -- sterling%20secure%20proxy
item.description: IBM Sterling Secure Proxy 6.0.3 and 6.1.0 could allow a local user with specific information about the system to obtain privileged information due to inadequate memory clearing during operations. IBM X-Force ID: 252139.

item.title: CVE-2023-22592|2023-01-18T18:33:47.025Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation%20for%20cloud%20pak
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation for Cloud Pak 21.0.1 through 21.0.4 could allow a local user to perform unauthorized actions due to insufficient permission settings. IBM X-Force ID: 244073.

item.description: IBM Sterling Secure Proxy 6.0.3 and 6.1.0 does not set the secure attribute on authorization tokens or session cookies. item.title: CVE-2024-22318|2024-04-03T01:30:57.319Z -- ibm -- i%20access%20client%20solutions
item.description: IBM i Access Client Solutions (ACS) 1.1.2 through 1.1.4 and 1.1.4.3 through 1.1.9.4 is vulnerable to NT LAN Manager (NTLM) hash disclosure by an attacker modifying UNC capable paths within ACS configuration files to point to a hostile server. If NTLM is enabled, the Windows operating system will try to authenticate using the current user's session. The hostile server could capture the NTLM hash information to obtain the user's credentials. IBM X-Force ID: 279091.

item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.2.0 through 11.2.4 and 12.0.0 through 12.0.2 is vulnerable to injection attacks in application logging by not sanitizing user provided data. This could lead to further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 282956.

item.title: CVE-2024-25050|2024-04-28T12:16:32.538Z -- ibm -- i
item.description: IBM i 7.2, 7.3, 7.4, 7.5 and IBM Rational Development Studio for i 7.2, 7.3, 7.4, 7.5 networking and compiler infrastructure could allow a local user to gain elevated privileges due to an unqualified library call. A malicious actor could cause user-controlled code to run with administrator privileges. IBM X-Force ID: 283242.

item.title: CVE-2024-25046|2024-04-03T12:17:45.191Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.1 and 11.5 is vulnerable to a denial of service by an authenticated user using a specially crafted query. IBM X-Force ID: 282953.

item.title: CVE-2024-25027|2024-03-31T11:40:11.155Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20docker
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access 10.0.6 could disclose sensitive snapshot information due to missing encryption. IBM X-Force ID: 281607.

item.title: CVE-2024-25016|2024-06-04T17:35:38.636Z -- ibm -- mq
item.description: IBM MQ and IBM MQ Appliance 9.0, 9.1, 9.2, 9.3 LTS and 9.3 CD could allow a remote unauthenticated attacker to cause a denial of service due to incorrect buffering logic. IBM X-Force ID: 281279.

item.title: CVE-2024-25021|2024-02-22T11:39:41.641Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX 7.3, VIOS 4.1's Perl implementation could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands. IBM X-Force ID: 281320.

item.title: CVE-2024-25015|2024-06-05T18:16:18.663Z -- ibm -- mq
item.description: IBM MQ 9.2 LTS, 9.3 LTS, and 9.3 CD Internet Pass-Thru could allow a remote user to cause a denial of service by sending HTTP requests that would consume all available resources. IBM X-Force ID: 281278.

item.title: CVE-2024-25029|2024-04-06T11:51:45.548Z -- ibm -- personal%20communications
item.description: IBM Personal Communications 14.0.6 through 15.0.1 includes a Windows service that is vulnerable to remote code execution (RCE) and local privilege escalation (LPE). The vulnerability allows any unprivileged user with network access to a target computer to run commands with full privileges in the context of NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM. This allows for a low privileged attacker to move laterally to affected systems and to escalate their privileges. IBM X-Force ID: 281619.

item.title: CVE-2024-25048|2024-06-04T17:35:01.063Z -- ibm -- mq%20appliance
item.description: IBM MQ Appliance 9.3 CD and LTS are vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking. A remote authenticated attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the server to crash. IBM X-Force ID: 283137.

item.title: CVE-2024-35142|2024-06-05T16:38:41.242Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20docker
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access Docker 10.0.0 through 10.0.6 could allow a local user to escalate their privileges due to execution of unnecessary privileges. IBM X-Force ID: 292418.

item.title: CVE-2024-35140|2024-06-04T17:33:36.042Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20docker
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access Docker 10.0.0 through 10.0.6 could allow a local user to escalate their privileges due to improper certificate validation. IBM X-Force ID: 292416.
